nodes.text: Ixidro Legorburu was a male from M'haeli. He was once a member of New Republic Intelligence Service, and had been a tactical aide during the Black Fleet Crisis. By 25 ABY he held the rank of colonel and was the director of the Home Fleet's Battle Assessment Division. Six months after the start of the Yuuzhan Vong War he briefed the leaders of the New Republic Defense Force on the threat of the Yuuzhan Vong.
